chapter.title: Janela: Parceiro de Negócios
chapter.para: Descrição: Gerenciamento de Parceiros de Negócios

Comentário/Ajuda: A Janela "Parceiro de Negócios" permite definir parceiros com os quais a sua Empresa irá interagir. Isto inclui clientes, fornecedores e funcionários. Antes de digitar ou de importar produtos, você deve definir seus fornecedores. Antes de gerar Pedidos você deve definir seus clientes. Esta janela contém todas as informações sobre seu Parceiro de Negócios e os valores digitados serão usados gerar todas as transações de documentos

section.title: Tabela: Parceiro de Negócios - C_BPartner
section.para: Comentário/Ajuda: A Aba "Parceiro de Negócios" define qualquer Entidade com a qual uma Organização transaciona.

row.entry: The Credit Used indicates the total amount of open or unpaid invoices in primary accounting currency for the Business Partner. Credit Management is based on the Total Open Amount, which includes Vendor activities.
Calculado Freight excluded Preço fixo Frete incluso Linha (I)
The Freight Cost Rule indicates the method used when charging for freight.
A Business Partner is anyone with whom you transact. This can include Vendor, Customer, Employee or Salesperson
Send emails with document attached (e.g. Invoice, Delivery Note, etc.)
The parent (organization) of the Business Partner for reporting purposes.
The Business Partner Group provides a method of defining defaults to be used for individual Business Partners.
Indicates if this Business Partner is a Customer
The Customer checkbox indicates if this Business Partner is a customer. If it is select additional fields will display which further define this customer.
Indicates if this Business Partner is a Vendor
The Vendor checkbox indicates if this Business Partner is a Vendor. If it is selected, additional fields will display which further identify this vendor.
The name of an entity (record) is used as an default search option in addition to the search key. The name is up to 60 characters in length.
Indicates if this Business Partner is an employee
The Employee checkbox indicates if this Business Partner is an Employee. If it is selected, additional fields will display which further identify this employee.
The Prospect checkbox indicates an entity that is an active prospect.
Indicates if the business partner is a sales representative or company agent
The Sales Rep checkbox indicates if this business partner is a sales representative. A sales representative may also be an employee, but does not need to be.
Your customer or vendor number at the Business Partner's site
The reference number can be printed on orders and invoices to allow your business partner to faster identify your records.
The Rating is used to differentiate the importance
EXISTS (SELECT * FROM C_BPartner bp WHERE AD_User.C_BPartner_ID=bp.C_BPartner_ID AND bp.IsSalesRep='Y')
The Sales Representative indicates the Sales Rep for this Region. Any Sales Rep must be a valid internal user.
Limite de Crédito de Cheque Próprio
Limite de Crédito de Cheque Terceiro
Segurar Crédito Crédito OK Cancelar Crédito Observar Crédito Sem Verificação de Crédito ('H')

Credit Management is inactive if Credit Status is No Credit Check, Credit Stop or if the Credit Limit is 0. If active, the status is set automatically set to Credit Hold, if the Total Open Balance (including Vendor activities) is higher then the Credit Limit. It is set to Credit Watch, if above 90% of the Credit Limit and Credit OK otherwise.

The Credit Limit indicates the total amount allowed "on account" in primary accounting currency. If the Credit Limit is 0, no check is performed. Credit Management is based on the Total Open Amount, which includes Vendor activities.
Total Open Balance Amount in primary Accounting Currency

The Total Open Balance Amount is the calculated open item amount for Customer and Vendor activity. If the Balance is below zero, we owe the Business Partner. The amount is used for Credit Management. Invoices and Payment Allocations determine the Open Balance (i.e. not Orders or Payments).
The Tax ID field identifies the legal Identification number of this Entity.
The Business Partner is another Organization for explicit Inter-Org transactions

The business partner is another organization in the system. So when performing transactions, the counter-document is created automatically. Example: You have BPartnerA linked to OrgA and BPartnerB linked to OrgB. If you create a sales order for BPartnerB in OrgA a purchase order is created for BPartnerA in OrgB. This allows to have explicit documents for Inter-Org transactions.
Business partner is exempt from tax on sales

If a business partner is exempt from tax on sales, the exempt tax rate is used. For this, you need to set up a tax rate with a 0% rate and indicate that this is your tax exempt rate. This is required for tax reporting, so that you can track tax exempt transactions.
Business partner is exempt from tax on purchases

If a business partner is exempt from tax on purchases, the exempt tax rate is used. For this, you need to set up a tax rate with a 0% rate and indicate that this is your tax exempt rate. This is required for tax reporting, so that you can track tax exempt transactions.
The URL defines an fully qualified web address like http://www.idempiere.org
Optional short description of the record
A description is limited to 255 characters.
A summary entity represents a branch in a tree rather than an end-node. Summary entities are used for reporting and do not have own values.
Após Entrega Imediato Após pedido despachado Programação do Cliente após entrega
The Invoice Rule defines how a Business Partner is invoiced and the frequency of invoicing.
The Invoice Schedule identifies the frequency used when generating invoices.
Dinheiro Débito Direto Cartão de Crédito Mixed Em Crédito Cheque Depósito Direto (P)
The Payment Rule indicates the method of invoice payment.
Payment Terms identify the method and timing of payment.
Disponibilidade Forçar Linha Completa Manual Pedido Completo Após o recebimento

The Delivery Rule indicates when an order should be delivered. For example should the order be delivered when the entire order is complete, when a line is complete or as the products become available.
How the order will be delivered
The Delivery Via indicates how the products should be delivered. For example, will the order be picked up or shipped.
M_PriceList.IsSOPriceList = 'Y' AND (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM M_PriceList_Version WHERE M_PriceList.M_PriceList_ID=M_PriceList_Version.M_PriceList_ID AND M_PriceList_Version.IsActive='Y')> 0
Unique identifier of a Price List
Price Lists are used to determine the pricing, margin and cost of items purchased or sold.
Minimum Shelf Life in percent based on Product Instance Guarantee Date

Minimum Shelf Life of products with Guarantee Date instance. If > 0 you cannot select products with a shelf life ((Guarantee Date-Today) / Guarantee Days) less than the minimum shelf life, unless you select "Show All"
Schema to calculate the trade discount percentage
After calculation of the (standard) price, the trade discount percentage is calculated and applied resulting in the final price.
The Dunning indicates the rules and method of dunning for past due payments.
Dinheiro Débito Direto Cartão de Crédito Mixed Em Crédito Cheque Depósito Direto
The Payment Rule indicates the method of purchase payment.
Payment rules for a purchase order
The PO Payment Term indicates the payment term that will be used when this purchase order becomes an invoice.
Indicate role of this Business partner as Manufacturer
M_PriceList.IsSOPriceList = 'N' AND (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM M_PriceList_Version WHERE M_PriceList.M_PriceList_ID=M_PriceList_Version.M_PriceList_ID AND M_PriceList_Version.IsActive='Y')> 0
Price List used by this Business Partner
Identifies the price list used by a Vendor for products purchased by this organization.
Schema to calculate the purchase trade discount percentage
Transaction Reference Number (Sales Order, Purchase Order) of your Business Partner

The business partner order reference is the order reference for this specific transaction; Often Purchase Order numbers are given to print on Invoices for easier reference. A standard number can be defined in the Business Partner (Customer) window.
The Language identifies the language to use for display and formatting
The Greeting identifies the greeting to print on correspondence.
Description to be used on orders
The Order Description identifies the standard description to use on orders for this Customer.
You need to define a Print Format to print the document.
Number of copies to be printed
The Document Copies indicates the number of copies of each document that will be generated.
Print Discount on Invoice and Order
The Discount Printed Checkbox indicates if the discount will be printed on the document.
Share of Customer's business as a percentage
The Share indicates the percentage of this Business Partner's volume of the products supplied.
Used for EDI - For details see www.dnb.com/dunsno/list.htm
Standard Industry Code or its successor NAIC - http://www.osha.gov/oshstats/sicser.html
The NAICS/SIC identifies either of these codes that may be applicable to this Business Partner.
The cost of gaining the prospect as a customer
The Acquisition Cost identifies the cost associated with making this prospect a customer.
Indicates the number of employees for this Business Partner. This field displays only for Prospects.
Total Volume of Sales in Thousands of Currency
The Sales Volume indicates the total volume of sales for a Business Partner.
The Potential Life Time Value is the anticipated revenue in primary accounting currency to be generated by the Business Partner.
The Actual Life Time Value is the recorded revenue in primary accounting currency generated by the Business Partner.
Indicar se o PN, o TdD e o Documento permitem ajustes OP x CNPJ (troca de produtos e/ou serviços)
Indicar se o PN, o TdD e o Documento permitem ajustes OP x CNPJ (troca de produtos e/ou serviços).
Used to identify Legal Entities in Brazil

PF - Pessoa Física PJ - Pessoa Jurídica
Brazilian BP Type (Identifies if the BP is a Legal Entity or an Individual)
Used to identify if the Business partner is a legal entity or an individual
City Identification Code used in Brazil (City Tax ID)
City Identification Code used in Brazil (City Tax ID)
Indicates that the CNPJ or CPF is valid and there are no duplicates in the database. It is not possible to change the CNPJ or CPF after the validation.
Contribuinte ICMS Contribuinte Isento Não Contribuinte (2)

Áreas de Livre Comércio Amazônia Ocidental Zona Franca de Manaus
Descrimina se a empresa faz parte de algum programa especial de Incentivos Fiscais
Desconto de ICMS % concedido por incentivos fiscais
Desconto de PIS % concedido por incentivos fiscais
Desconto de COFINS % concedido por incentivos fiscais

section.title: Tabela: Contato (Usuário) - AD_User
section.para: Descrição: Gerenciamento de Usuário dentro do Sistema - Interno ou Contato de Parceiro de Negócios
Comentário/Ajuda: O Usuário identifica um usuário único e exclusivo dentro do sistema. Este poderia ser um usuário interno ou um contato de parceiro de negócios

row.entry: The organization which performs or initiates this transaction (for another organization). The owning Organization may not be the transaction organization in a service bureau environment, with centralized services, and inter-organization transactions.
Supervisor for this user/organization - used for escalation and approval
The Supervisor indicates who will be used for forwarding and escalating issues for this user - or for approvals.
User Name (ID) in the Mail System
The user name in the mail system is usually the string before the @ of your email address. Required if the mail server requires authentification to send emails.
Password of your email user id
Required if the mail server requires authentification to send emails.
User within the system - Internal or Business Partner Contact
The User identifies a unique user in the system. This could be an internal user or a business partner contact
User Name used for authorization via LDAP (directory) services

Optional LDAP system user name for the user. If not defined, the normal Name of the user is used. This allows to use the internal (LDAP) user id (e.g. jjanke) and the normal display name (e.g. Jorg Janke). The LDAP User Name can also be used without LDAP enables (see system window). This would allow to sign in as jjanke and use the display name of Jorg Janke.
A Business Partner is anyone with whom you transact. This can include Vendor, Customer, Employee or Salesperson
The name of an entity (record) is used as an default search option in addition to the search key. The name is up to 60 characters in length.
Optional short description of the record
A description is limited to 255 characters.
The Comments field allows for free form entry of additional information.

The Email Address is the Electronic Mail ID for this User and should be fully qualified (e.g. joe.smith@company.com). The Email Address is used to access the self service application functionality from the web.
The Password for this User. Passwords are required to identify authorized users. For iDempiere Users, you can change the password via the Process "Reset Password".
The Greeting identifies the greeting to print on correspondence.
Identifies the (ship to) address for this Business Partner
The Partner address indicates the location of a Business Partner
Name this entity is referred to as
The Title indicates the name that an entity is referred to as.
The Phone field identifies a telephone number
The 2nd Phone field identifies an alternate telephone number.
The Fax identifies a facsimile number for this Business Partner or Location
Emails or Notification sent out for Request Updates, etc.
((C_Job.IsEmployee=(SELECT IsEmployee FROM C_BPartner WHERE C_BPartner_ID=@C_BPartner_ID:0@)) OR (C_Job.IsEmployee='N' AND @C_BPartner_ID:0@=0))
The user/contact has full access to Business Partner information and resources

If selected, the user has full access to the Business Partner (BP) information (Business Documents like Orders, Invoices - Requests) or resources (Assets, Downloads). If you deselect it, the user has no access rights unless, you explicitly grant it in tab "BP Access"
The field contains additional information how the EMail Address has been verified
Date this individual was last contacted
The Last Contact indicates the date that this Business Partner Contact was last contacted.
The Last Result identifies the result of the last contact made.
User is NFe Contact (receive email automatically)
O email compõe a Tag Email no XML do Documento Fical
Used to identify individuals in Brazil

section.title: Tabela: Área de Interesse - R_ContactInterest
section.para: Descrição: Área de interesse de contato de um Parceiro de Negócios
Comentário/Ajuda: Áreas de interesse podem ser utilizadas em Campanhas de Marketing

row.entry: User within the system - Internal or Business Partner Contact
The User identifies a unique user in the system. This could be an internal user or a business partner contact
Interest Areas reflect interest in a topic by a contact. Interest areas can be used for marketing campaigns.
Date the contact subscribe the interest area
If the field has a date, the customer opted out (unsubscribed) and cannot receive mails for the Interest Area

section.title: Tabela: Acesso ao PN - AD_UserBPAccess
section.para: Descrição: Acesso do usuário/contato aos recursos e informações do parceiro de negócios
Comentário/Ajuda: Se no Nível de Usuário NÃO for selecionado "Acesso Total PN", você terá de dar acesso explícito aqui.

row.entry: User/contact access to Business Partner information and resources
If on User level, "Full BP Access" is NOT selected, you need to give access explicitly here.
User within the system - Internal or Business Partner Contact
The User identifies a unique user in the system. This could be an internal user or a business partner contact
Ativos, Download Documentos da Negociação Solicitações
Type of Access of the user/contact to Business Partner information and resources
If on User level, "Full BP Access" is NOT selected, give access explicitly

Ajuste Estoque Previsto Memorando de Crédito AP Fatura AP Pagamento AP Memorando de Crédito AR Fatura Pro Forma AR Fatura AR Recibo AR Alocação de Pagamentos Extrato Bancário Diário de Caixa (Cash Journal) Ordem de Distribuição Documento de Ordem de Serviço Lançamento de Ativo Fixo Baixa de Ativo Fixo Depreciação de Ativo Fixo Documento de Razão Geral Diário de Razão Geral Folha de Pagamento Coletor de Custos de Produção Estoque Físico de Material Movimentação de Material Produção de Material Recebimento de Material Despacho de Material Ordem de Manutenção Ordem de Produção Ordem de Qualidade Confrontar Fatura Confrontar PC (Pedido de Compra) Nota Fiscal Brasil Emissão do Projeto Plano Mestre de Produção Pedido de Compra Requisição de Compras RPS / NFS Ordem de Venda Apuração de Impostos
The Document Base Type identifies the base or starting point for a document. Multiple document types may share a single document base type.
Request Types are used for processing and categorizing requests. Options are Account Inquiry, Warranty Issue, etc.

section.title: Tabela: Localização - C_BPartner_Location
section.para: Comentário/Ajuda: A Aba "Localização" define a localização física de um parceiro de negócios. Um parceiro de negócios pode ter múltiplos registros de localização.

row.entry: Identifies the (ship to) address for this Business Partner
The Partner address indicates the location of a Business Partner
A Business Partner is anyone with whom you transact. This can include Vendor, Customer, Employee or Salesperson
The name of an entity (record) is used as an default search option in addition to the search key. The name is up to 60 characters in length.
The Location / Address field defines the location of an entity.
The Phone field identifies a telephone number
The 2nd Phone field identifies an alternate telephone number.
The Fax identifies a facsimile number for this Business Partner or Location
The ISDN identifies a ISDN or Modem line number.
If the Ship Address is selected, the location is used to ship goods to a customer or receive goods from a vendor.
If the Invoice Address is selected, the location is used to send invoices to a customer or receive invoices from a vendor.
Business Partner pays from that address and we'll send dunning letters there
If the Pay-From Address is selected, this location is the address the Business Partner pays from and where dunning letters will be sent to.
If the Remit-To Address is selected, the location is used to send payments to the vendor.
The Sales Region indicates a specific area of sales coverage.
COF_M_ShipRegion_ID in (select cof_m_shipregion_id from cof_m_shipregion_city where C_City_ID = (select c_location.c_city_id from c_location where c_location_id = @C_Location_ID@))
Method or manner of product delivery
The Shipper indicates the method of delivering product

section.title: Tabela: Conta Bancária - C_BP_BankAccount
section.para: Comentário/Ajuda: A Aba "Definir Conta Bancária" define as informações bancárias para este parceiro de negócios. Este dado é usado para processar pagamentos e remessas de valores.

row.entry: Bank Account of the Business Partner
The Partner Bank Account identifies the bank account to be used for this Business Partner
A Business Partner is anyone with whom you transact. This can include Vendor, Customer, Employee or Salesperson
User within the system - Internal or Business Partner Contact
The User identifies a unique user in the system. This could be an internal user or a business partner contact
The ACH checkbox indicates if this Bank Account accepts ACH transactions.
Ambos Débito Direto Nenhum Depósito Direto (B)
Determines how the bank account is used.
The Bank is a unique identifier of a Bank for this Organization or for a Business Partner with whom this Organization transacts.
The Bank Account Type field indicates the type of account (savings, checking etc) this account is defined as.
The Bank Routing Number (ABA Number) identifies a legal Bank. It is used in routing checks and electronic transactions.
The Account Number indicates the Number assigned to this bank account.

If your bank provides an International Bank Account Number, enter it here Details ISO 13616 and http://www.ecbs.org. The account number has the maximum length of 22 characters (without spaces). The IBAN is often printed with a apace after 4 characters. Do not enter the spaces in iDempiere.
Amex Cabal ATM Diners Elo Hipercard MasterCard Discover Outros Cartão de Compras Sorocred Aura Visa
The Credit Card drop down list box is used for selecting the type of Credit Card presented for payment.
The Credit Card number indicates the number on the credit card, without blanks or spaces.
Credit Card Verification code on credit card
The Credit Card Verification indicates the verification code on the credit card (AMEX 4 digits on front; MC,Visa 3 digits back)
The Expiry Month indicates the expiry month for this credit card.
The Expiry Year indicates the expiry year for this credit card.
Name on Credit Card or Account holder
The Name of the Credit Card or Account holder.
Street address of the Credit Card or Account holder
The Street Address of the Credit Card or Account holder.
City or the Credit Card or Account Holder
The Account City indicates the City of the Credit Card or Account holder
Zip Code of the Credit Card or Account Holder
The Zip Code of the Credit Card or Account Holder.
State of the Credit Card or Account holder
The State of the Credit Card or Account holder
The Driver's License being used as identification.
The Social Security number being used as identification.
The EMail Address indicates the EMail address off the Credit Card or Account holder.
The Address Verified indicates if the address has been verified by the Credit Card Company.
The Zip Code has been verified
The Zip Verified indicates if the zip code has been verified by the Credit Card Company.
ID do Perfil de Pagamento do Cliente
The Payment Processor indicates the processor to be used for electronic payments
A Business Partner is anyone with whom you transact. This can include Vendor, Customer, Employee or Salesperson
Identifies the (ship to) address for this Business Partner
The Partner address indicates the location of a Business Partner

section.title: Tabela: Contabilidade de Clientes - C_BP_Customer_Acct
section.para: Comentário/Ajuda: A Aba "Contabilidade de Clientes" define as contas padrão a serem usadas quando este parceiro de negócios for referenciado em uma transação de contas a receber.

row.entry: Account to post services related Accounts Receivables if you want to differentiate between Services and Product related revenue. This account is only used, if posting to service accounts is enabled in the accounting schema.
A Business Partner is anyone with whom you transact. This can include Vendor, Customer, Employee or Salesperson
An Accounting Schema defines the rules used in accounting such as costing method, currency and calendar
The Customer Receivables Accounts indicates the account to be used for recording transaction for customers receivables.
The Customer Prepayment account indicates the account to be used for recording prepayments from a customer.

section.title: Tabela: Contabilidade de Fornecedores - C_BP_Vendor_Acct
section.para: Comentário/Ajuda: A Aba "Contabilidade de Fornecedores" define as contas padrão a serem usadas quando este parceiro de negócios for referenciado em uma transação de contas a pagar.

row.entry: The Vendor Service Liability account indicates the account to use for recording service liabilities. It is used if you need to distinguish between Liability for products and services. This account is only used, if posting to service accounts is enabled in the accounting schema.
A Business Partner is anyone with whom you transact. This can include Vendor, Customer, Employee or Salesperson
An Accounting Schema defines the rules used in accounting such as costing method, currency and calendar
The Vendor Liability account indicates the account used for recording transactions for vendor liabilities
The Vendor Prepayment Account indicates the account used to record prepayments from a vendor.

section.title: Tabela: Contabilidade de Funcionários - C_BP_Employee_Acct
section.para: Comentário/Ajuda: A Aba "Contabilidade de Funcionários" define as contas padrão a serem usadas quando este parceiro de negócios for referenciado em uma transação de reembolso de despesas.

row.entry: A Business Partner is anyone with whom you transact. This can include Vendor, Customer, Employee or Salesperson
An Accounting Schema defines the rules used in accounting such as costing method, currency and calendar
The Employee Expense Account identifies the account to use for recording expenses for this employee.
The Employee Prepayment Account identifies the account to use for recording expense advances made to this employee.

section.title: Tabela: Cliente - C_BPartner
section.para: Comentário/Ajuda: A Aba "Cliente" define um Parceiro de Negócios que é um cliente desta organização. Se a caixa de verificação "Cliente" for selecionada, então os campos necessários serão mostrados.

row.entry: M_PriceList.IsSOPriceList = 'N' AND (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM M_PriceList_Version WHERE M_PriceList.M_PriceList_ID=M_PriceList_Version.M_PriceList_ID AND M_PriceList_Version.IsActive='Y')> 0
Price List used by this Business Partner
Identifies the price list used by a Vendor for products purchased by this organization.
The URL defines an fully qualified web address like http://www.idempiere.org
Business partner is exempt from tax on sales

If a business partner is exempt from tax on sales, the exempt tax rate is used. For this, you need to set up a tax rate with a 0% rate and indicate that this is your tax exempt rate. This is required for tax reporting, so that you can track tax exempt transactions.
The Rating is used to differentiate the importance
Dinheiro Débito Direto Cartão de Crédito Mixed Em Crédito Cheque Depósito Direto
The Payment Rule indicates the method of purchase payment.
The Greeting identifies the greeting to print on correspondence.
Calculado Freight excluded Preço fixo Frete incluso Linha (I)
The Freight Cost Rule indicates the method used when charging for freight.
The Business Partner Group provides a method of defining defaults to be used for individual Business Partners.
Payment rules for a purchase order
The PO Payment Term indicates the payment term that will be used when this purchase order becomes an invoice.
Schema to calculate the purchase trade discount percentage
Send emails with document attached (e.g. Invoice, Delivery Note, etc.)
The parent (organization) of the Business Partner for reporting purposes.
Segurar Crédito Crédito OK Cancelar Crédito Observar Crédito Sem Verificação de Crédito ('H')

Credit Management is inactive if Credit Status is No Credit Check, Credit Stop or if the Credit Limit is 0. If active, the status is set automatically set to Credit Hold, if the Total Open Balance (including Vendor activities) is higher then the Credit Limit. It is set to Credit Watch, if above 90% of the Credit Limit and Credit OK otherwise.
The Business Partner is another Organization for explicit Inter-Org transactions

The business partner is another organization in the system. So when performing transactions, the counter-document is created automatically. Example: You have BPartnerA linked to OrgA and BPartnerB linked to OrgB. If you create a sales order for BPartnerB in OrgA a purchase order is created for BPartnerA in OrgB. This allows to have explicit documents for Inter-Org transactions.
Total Open Balance Amount in primary Accounting Currency

The Total Open Balance Amount is the calculated open item amount for Customer and Vendor activity. If the Balance is below zero, we owe the Business Partner. The amount is used for Credit Management. Invoices and Payment Allocations determine the Open Balance (i.e. not Orders or Payments).
A Business Partner is anyone with whom you transact. This can include Vendor, Customer, Employee or Salesperson
Business partner is exempt from tax on purchases

If a business partner is exempt from tax on purchases, the exempt tax rate is used. For this, you need to set up a tax rate with a 0% rate and indicate that this is your tax exempt rate. This is required for tax reporting, so that you can track tax exempt transactions.
Indicate role of this Business partner as Manufacturer
PF - Pessoa Física PJ - Pessoa Jurídica
Brazilian BP Type (Identifies if the BP is a Legal Entity or an Individual)
Used to identify if the Business partner is a legal entity or an individual
Used to identify Legal Entities in Brazil

< a href="http://www.serasa.com.br" target="_blank"> Serasa< /a>
< a href="http://www.sintegra.gov.br" target="_blank"> Sintegra< /a>

< a href="http://www8.receita.fazenda.gov.br/SimplesNacional/Aplicacoes/ATBHE/ConsultaOptantes.app/ConsultarOpcao.aspx" target="_blank"> Simples Nacional< /a>
Used to identify individuals in Brazil

< a href="http://www.serasa.com.br" target="_blank"> Serasa< /a>
< a href="http://www.sintegra.gov.br" target="_blank"> Sintegra< /a>
< a href="https://www.ccfacil.com.br/Login.asp?ret_link=%2FConsulta%2Easp%3FCodConsulta%3D34" target="_blank"> CCFácil< /a>
< a href="http://www.receita.fazenda.gov.br/PessoaJuridica/CNPJ/cnpjreva/Cnpjreva_Solicitacao.asp" target="_blank"> Receita < /a>
< a href="http://www.sci.com.br/" target="_blank"> Equifax (SCI)< /a>
< a href="http://www8.receita.fazenda.gov.br/SimplesNacional/Aplicacoes/ATBHE/ConsultaOptantes.app/ConsultarOpcao.aspx" target="_blank"> Simples Nacional< /a>
Used to identify individuals in Brazil
Used to identify individuals in Brazil
City Identification Code used in Brazil (City Tax ID)
City Identification Code used in Brazil (City Tax ID)
Used to Identify the IE (State Tax ID)
Used to Identify the IE (State Tax ID)
Indicates that the CNPJ or CPF is valid and there are no duplicates in the database. It is not possible to change the CNPJ or CPF after the validation.
Defines if the record has Substituion
Defines if the record has Substituion
Optional short description of the record
A description is limited to 255 characters.
Total Volume of Sales in Thousands of Currency
The Sales Volume indicates the total volume of sales for a Business Partner.
Your customer or vendor number at the Business Partner's site
The reference number can be printed on orders and invoices to allow your business partner to faster identify your records.
Used for EDI - For details see www.dnb.com/dunsno/list.htm
Indicates the number of employees for this Business Partner. This field displays only for Prospects.
The Tax ID field identifies the legal Identification number of this Entity.
Standard Industry Code or its successor NAIC - http://www.osha.gov/oshstats/sicser.html
The NAICS/SIC identifies either of these codes that may be applicable to this Business Partner.
A summary entity represents a branch in a tree rather than an end-node. Summary entities are used for reporting and do not have own values.
The Language identifies the language to use for display and formatting
Indicates if this Business Partner is a Vendor
The Vendor checkbox indicates if this Business Partner is a Vendor. If it is selected, additional fields will display which further identify this vendor.
The Prospect checkbox indicates an entity that is an active prospect.
The First Sale Date identifies the date of the first sale to this Business Partner
The cost of gaining the prospect as a customer
The Acquisition Cost identifies the cost associated with making this prospect a customer.
The Potential Life Time Value is the anticipated revenue in primary accounting currency to be generated by the Business Partner.
The Actual Life Time Value is the recorded revenue in primary accounting currency generated by the Business Partner.
Share of Customer's business as a percentage
The Share indicates the percentage of this Business Partner's volume of the products supplied.
Indicates if this Business Partner is an employee
The Employee checkbox indicates if this Business Partner is an Employee. If it is selected, additional fields will display which further identify this employee.
Indicates if the business partner is a sales representative or company agent
The Sales Rep checkbox indicates if this business partner is a sales representative. A sales representative may also be an employee, but does not need to be.
The name of an entity (record) is used as an default search option in addition to the search key. The name is up to 60 characters in length.
Indicates if this Business Partner is a Customer
The Customer checkbox indicates if this Business Partner is a customer. If it is select additional fields will display which further define this customer.
Number of copies to be printed
The Document Copies indicates the number of copies of each document that will be generated.
Após Entrega Imediato Após pedido despachado Programação do Cliente após entrega
The Invoice Rule defines how a Business Partner is invoiced and the frequency of invoicing.
The Invoice Schedule identifies the frequency used when generating invoices.
Disponibilidade Forçar Linha Completa Manual Pedido Completo Após o recebimento

The Delivery Rule indicates when an order should be delivered. For example should the order be delivered when the entire order is complete, when a line is complete or as the products become available.
How the order will be delivered
The Delivery Via indicates how the products should be delivered. For example, will the order be picked up or shipped.
M_PriceList.IsSOPriceList = 'Y' AND (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM M_PriceList_Version WHERE M_PriceList.M_PriceList_ID=M_PriceList_Version.M_PriceList_ID AND M_PriceList_Version.IsActive='Y')> 0
Unique identifier of a Price List
Price Lists are used to determine the pricing, margin and cost of items purchased or sold.
Schema to calculate the trade discount percentage
After calculation of the (standard) price, the trade discount percentage is calculated and applied resulting in the final price.
Dinheiro Débito Direto Cartão de Crédito Mixed Em Crédito Cheque Depósito Direto (P)
The Payment Rule indicates the method of invoice payment.
Payment Terms identify the method and timing of payment.
EXISTS (SELECT * FROM C_BPartner bp WHERE AD_User.C_BPartner_ID=bp.C_BPartner_ID AND bp.IsSalesRep='Y')
The Sales Representative indicates the Sales Rep for this Region. Any Sales Rep must be a valid internal user.
The Dunning indicates the rules and method of dunning for past due payments.
Transaction Reference Number (Sales Order, Purchase Order) of your Business Partner

The business partner order reference is the order reference for this specific transaction; Often Purchase Order numbers are given to print on Invoices for easier reference. A standard number can be defined in the Business Partner (Customer) window.
Print Discount on Invoice and Order
The Discount Printed Checkbox indicates if the discount will be printed on the document.
Description to be used on orders
The Order Description identifies the standard description to use on orders for this Customer.
You need to define a Print Format to print the document.
Minimum Shelf Life in percent based on Product Instance Guarantee Date

Minimum Shelf Life of products with Guarantee Date instance. If > 0 you cannot select products with a shelf life ((Guarantee Date-Today) / Guarantee Days) less than the minimum shelf life, unless you select "Show All"

The Credit Limit indicates the total amount allowed "on account" in primary accounting currency. If the Credit Limit is 0, no check is performed. Credit Management is based on the Total Open Amount, which includes Vendor activities.

The Credit Used indicates the total amount of open or unpaid invoices in primary accounting currency for the Business Partner. Credit Management is based on the Total Open Amount, which includes Vendor activities.
Consumidor Final Exportação Indireta Exportação Importação Uso Interno Industrialização Outros Remessa Revenda Transferência

section.title: Tabela: Fornecedor - C_BPartner
section.para: Comentário/Ajuda: A Aba "Fornecedor" define um Parceiro de Negócios que é um fornecedor desta organização. Se a caixa de verificação "Fornecedor" for selecionada, então os campos necessários serão mostrados.

row.entry: Business partner is exempt from tax on purchases

If a business partner is exempt from tax on purchases, the exempt tax rate is used. For this, you need to set up a tax rate with a 0% rate and indicate that this is your tax exempt rate. This is required for tax reporting, so that you can track tax exempt transactions.

The Total Open Balance Amount is the calculated open item amount for Customer and Vendor activity. If the Balance is below zero, we owe the Business Partner. The amount is used for Credit Management. Invoices and Payment Allocations determine the Open Balance (i.e. not Orders or Payments).
A Business Partner is anyone with whom you transact. This can include Vendor, Customer, Employee or Salesperson

00 - Nota Fiscal Serviço 01 - Nota Fiscal 02 - Nota Fiscal de Venda a Consumidor 04 - Nota Fiscal de Produtor 06 - Nota Fiscal/Conta de Energia Elétrica 07 - Nota Fiscal de Serviço de Transporte 08 - Conhecimento de Transporte Rodoviário de Cargas 09 - Conhecimento de Transporte Aquaviário de Cargas 10 - Conhecimento Aéreo 11 - Conhecimento de Transporte Ferroviário de Cargas 13 - Bilhete de Passagem Rodoviário 14 - Bilhete de Passagem Aquaviário 15 - Bilhete de Passagem e Nota de Bagagem 16 - Bilhete de Passagem Ferroviário 17 - Despacho de Transporte 18 - Resumo de Movimento Diário 1B - Nota Fiscal Avulsa 20 - Ordem de Coleta de Cargas 21 - Nota Fiscal de Serviço de Comunicação 22 - Nota Fiscal de Serviço de Telecomunicação 23 - GNRE 24 - Autorização de Carregamento e Transporte 25 - Manifesto de Carga 26 - Conhecimento de Transporte Multimodal de Cargas 27 - Nota Fiscal de Transporte Ferroviário de Cargas 28 - Nota Fiscal/Conta de Fornecimento de Gás Canalizado 29 - Nota Fiscal/Conta de Fornecimento de Água Canalizada 2D - Cupom Fiscal emitido por ECF 2E - Bilhete de Passagem emitido por ECF 30 - Bilhete/Recibo do Passageiro 55 - Nota Fiscal Eletrônica 57 - Conhecimento de Transporte Eletrônico – CT-e 59 - Cupom Fiscal Eletrônico – CF-e-SAT 60 - Cupom Fiscal Eletrônico CF-e - ECD 65 - Nota Fiscal Eletrônica ao Consumidor Final – NFC-e 8B - Conhecimento de Transporte de Cargas Avulso
Identifies the model of Nota Fiscal

section.title: Tabela: Funcionário - C_BPartner

The Delivery Rule indicates when an order should be delivered. For example should the order be delivered when the entire order is complete, when a line is complete or as the products become available.
EXISTS (SELECT * FROM C_BPartner bp WHERE AD_User.C_BPartner_ID=bp.C_BPartner_ID AND bp.IsSalesRep='Y')
The Sales Representative indicates the Sales Rep for this Region. Any Sales Rep must be a valid internal user.
A Business Partner is anyone with whom you transact. This can include Vendor, Customer, Employee or Salesperson
How the order will be delivered
The Delivery Via indicates how the products should be delivered. For example, will the order be picked up or shipped.
The Business Partner Group provides a method of defining defaults to be used for individual Business Partners.
Payment rules for a purchase order
The PO Payment Term indicates the payment term that will be used when this purchase order becomes an invoice.
The name of an entity (record) is used as an default search option in addition to the search key. The name is up to 60 characters in length.
Indicates if this Business Partner is an employee
The Employee checkbox indicates if this Business Partner is an Employee. If it is selected, additional fields will display which further identify this employee.
Indicates if the business partner is a sales representative or company agent
The Sales Rep checkbox indicates if this business partner is a sales representative. A sales representative may also be an employee, but does not need to be.
A Business Partner is anyone with whom you transact. This can include Vendor, Customer, Employee or Salesperson
The Document Date indicates the date the document was generated. It may or may not be the same as the accounting date.
Optional short description of the record
A description is limited to 255 characters.
